Cards.Name: Abandoned Mine
Cards.FullText: +1 Coin

Cards.Name: Madman
Cards.SpecialText: (This card is not in the supply.)
Cards.FullText: (This card is not in the supply.)

Cards.Name: Mercenary
Cards.SpecialText: You may trash 2 cards from your hand. If you do, +2 Cards, +2 Coins, and each other player discards down to 3 cards in hand. (This is not in the Supply.)
Cards.FullText: You may trash 2 cards from your hand. If you do, +2 Cards, +2 Coins, and each other player discards down to 3 cards in hand. (This is not in the Supply.)

Cards.Name: Ruined Library
Cards.FullText: +1 Card

Cards.Name: Ruined Market
Cards.FullText: +1 Buy

Cards.Name: Ruined Village
Cards.FullText: +1 Action

Cards.Name: Spoils
Cards.SpecialText: (This is not in the Supply.)
Cards.FullText: (This is not in the Supply.)

Cards.Name: Survivors
Cards.SpecialText: Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Discard them or put them back in any order.
Cards.FullText: Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Discard them or put them back in any order.

Cards.Name: Hovel
Cards.SpecialText: When you buy a Victory card, you may trash this from your hand.
Cards.FullText: When you buy a Victory card, you may trash this from your hand.

Cards.Name: Necropolis
Cards.FullText: +2 Actions

Cards.Name: Overgrown Estate
Cards.SpecialText: 0 Victory<hr>When you trash this, +1 Card.
Cards.FullText: 0 Victory<hr>When you trash this, +1 Card.

Cards.Name: Poor House
Cards.SpecialText: Reveal your hand. -1 Coin per Treasure card in your hand, to a minimum of 0 Coins.
Cards.FullText: Reveal your hand. -1 Coin per Treasure card in your hand, to a minimum of 0 Coins.

Cards.Name: Beggar
Cards.SpecialText: Gain 3 Coppers, putting them into your hand.<hr>When another player plays an Attack card, you may discard this. If you do, gain two Silvers, putting one on top of your deck.
Cards.FullText: Gain 3 Coppers, putting them into your hand.<hr>When another player plays an Attack card, you may discard this. If you do, gain two Silvers, putting one on top of your deck.

Cards.Name: Squire
Cards.SpecialText: Choose one: +2 Actions; or +2 Buys; or gain a Silver.<hr>When you trash this, gain an Attack card.
Cards.FullText: Choose one: +2 Actions; or +2 Buys; or gain a Silver.<hr>When you trash this, gain an Attack card.

Cards.Name: Vagrant
Cards.SpecialText: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a Curse, Ruins, Shelter, or Victory card, put it into your hand.
Cards.FullText: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a Curse, Ruins, Shelter, or Victory card, put it into your hand.

Cards.Name: Forager
Cards.SpecialText: Trash a card from your hand. +1 Coin per differently named Treasure in the trash.
Cards.FullText: Trash a card from your hand. +1 Coin per differently named Treasure in the trash.

Cards.Name: Hermit
Cards.SpecialText: Look through your discard pile. You may trash a card from your discard pile or hand that is not a Treasure. Gain a card costing up to 3 Coins.<hr>When you discard this from play, if you did not buy any cards this turn, trash this and gain a Madman from the Madman pile.
Cards.FullText: Look through your discard pile. You may trash a card from your discard pile or hand that is not a Treasure. Gain a card costing up to 3 Coins.<hr>When you discard this from play, if you did not buy any cards this turn, trash this and gain a Madman from the Madman pile.

Cards.Name: Market Square
Cards.FullText: +1 Card, +1 Action, +1 Buy<hr>When one of your cards is trashed, you may discard this from your hand. If you do, gain a Gold.

Cards.Name: Sage
Cards.SpecialText: Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal one costing 3 Coins or more. Put that card into your hand and discard the rest.
Cards.FullText: Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal one costing 3 Coins or more. Put that card into your hand and discard the rest.

Cards.Name: Storeroom
Cards.SpecialText: Discard any number of cards. +1 Card per card discarded. Discard any number of cards. +1 Coin per card discarded the second time.
Cards.FullText: Discard any number of cards. +1 Card per card discarded. Discard any number of cards. +1 Coin per card discarded the second time.

Cards.Name: Urchin
Cards.SpecialText: Each other player discards down to 4 cards in hand.<hr>When you play another Attack card with this in play, you may trash this. If you do, gain a mercenary from the Mercenary pile.
Cards.FullText: Each other player discards down to 4 cards in hand.<hr>When you play another Attack card with this in play, you may trash this. If you do, gain a mercenary from the Mercenary pile.

Cards.Name: Armory
Cards.SpecialText: Gain a card costing up to 4 Coins, putting it on top of your deck.
Cards.FullText: Gain a card costing up to 4 Coins, putting it on top of your deck.

Cards.Name: Death Cart
Cards.SpecialText: You may trash an Action card from your hand. If you don't, trash this.<hr>When you gain this, gain 2 Ruins.
Cards.FullText: You may trash an Action card from your hand. If you don't, trash this.<hr>When you gain this, gain 2 Ruins.

Cards.Name: Feodum
Cards.SpecialText: Worth 1 Victory for every 3 Silvers in your deck (round down).<hr>When you trash this, gain 3 Silvers.
Cards.FullText: Worth 1 Victory for every 3 Silvers in your deck (round down).<hr>When you trash this, gain 3 Silvers.

Cards.Name: Fortress
Cards.FullText: +1 Card, +2 Actions<hr>When you trash this, put it into your hand.

Cards.Name: Ironmonger
Cards.SpecialText: Victory card, +1 Card
Cards.FullText: Victory card, +1 Card

Cards.Name: Marauder
Cards.SpecialText: Gain a Spoils from the Spoils pile. Each other player gains a Ruins.
Cards.FullText: Gain a Spoils from the Spoils pile. Each other player gains a Ruins.

Cards.Name: Procession
Cards.SpecialText: You may play an Action card from your hand twice. Trash it. Gain an Action card costing exactly 1 Coin more than it.
Cards.FullText: You may play an Action card from your hand twice. Trash it. Gain an Action card costing exactly 1 Coin more than it.

Cards.Name: Rats
Cards.SpecialText: Gain a Rats. Trash a card from your hand other than a Rats (or reveal a hand of all Rats).<hr>When you tash this, +1 Card.
Cards.FullText: Gain a Rats. Trash a card from your hand other than a Rats (or reveal a hand of all Rats).<hr>When you tash this, +1 Card.

Cards.Name: Scavenger
Cards.SpecialText: You may put your deck into your discard pile. Look through your discard pile and put one card from it on top of your deck.
Cards.FullText: You may put your deck into your discard pile. Look through your discard pile and put one card from it on top of your deck.

Cards.Name: Sir Martin
Cards.SpecialText: Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.
Cards.FullText: Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.

Cards.Name: Wandering Minstrel
Cards.SpecialText: Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put the Actions back on top in any order and discard the rest.
Cards.FullText: Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put the Actions back on top in any order and discard the rest.

Cards.Name: Band of Misfits
Cards.SpecialText: This is that card until it leaves play.
Cards.FullText: This is that card until it leaves play.

Cards.Name: Bandit Camp
Cards.SpecialText: Gain a Spoils from the Spoils pile.
Cards.FullText: Gain a Spoils from the Spoils pile.

Cards.Name: Catacombs
Cards.SpecialText: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Choose one: Put them into your hand; or discard them and +3 Cards.<hr>When you trash this, gain a cheaper card.
Cards.FullText: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Choose one: Put them into your hand; or discard them and +3 Cards.<hr>When you trash this, gain a cheaper card.

Cards.Name: Count
Cards.SpecialText: Choose one: +3 Coins; or trash your hand; or gain a Duchy.
Cards.FullText: Choose one: +3 Coins; or trash your hand; or gain a Duchy.

Cards.Name: Counterfeit
Cards.SpecialText: When you play this, you may play a Treasure from your hand twice. If you do, trash that Treasure.
Cards.FullText: When you play this, you may play a Treasure from your hand twice. If you do, trash that Treasure.

Cards.Name: Cultist
Cards.SpecialText: Each other player gains a Ruins. You may play a Cultist from your hand.<hr>When you trash this, +3 Cards.
Cards.FullText: Each other player gains a Ruins. You may play a Cultist from your hand.<hr>When you trash this, +3 Cards.

Cards.Name: Dame Anna
Cards.SpecialText: Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.
Cards.FullText: Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.

Cards.Name: Dame Josephine
Cards.SpecialText: Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.
Cards.FullText: Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.

Cards.Name: Dame Molly
Cards.SpecialText: Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.
Cards.FullText: Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.

Cards.Name: Dame Natalie
Cards.SpecialText: Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.
Cards.FullText: Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.

Cards.Name: Dame Sylvia
Cards.SpecialText: Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.
Cards.FullText: Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.

Cards.Name: Graverobber
Cards.SpecialText: Choose one: Gain a card from the trash costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, putting it on top of your deck; or trash an Action card from your hand and gain a card costing up to 3 Coins more than it.
Cards.FullText: Choose one: Gain a card from the trash costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, putting it on top of your deck; or trash an Action card from your hand and gain a card costing up to 3 Coins more than it.

Cards.Name: Junk Dealer
Cards.SpecialText: Trash a card from your hand.
Cards.FullText: Trash a card from your hand.

Cards.Name: Mystic
Cards.SpecialText: Name a card. Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's the named card, put it into your hand.
Cards.FullText: Name a card. Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's the named card, put it into your hand.

Cards.Name: Pillage
Cards.SpecialText: Gain 2 Spoils from the Spoils pile.
Cards.FullText: Gain 2 Spoils from the Spoils pile.

Cards.Name: Rebuild
Cards.SpecialText: Name a card. Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal a Victory card that is not the named card. Discard the other cards. Trash the Victory card and gain a Victory card costing up to 3 Coins more than it.
Cards.FullText: Name a card. Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal a Victory card that is not the named card. Discard the other cards. Trash the Victory card and gain a Victory card costing up to 3 Coins more than it.

Cards.Name: Rogue
Cards.SpecialText: If there are any cards in the trash costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, gain one of them. Otherwise, each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest.
Cards.FullText: If there are any cards in the trash costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, gain one of them. Otherwise, each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest.

Cards.Name: Sir Bailey
Cards.SpecialText: Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.
Cards.FullText: Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.

Cards.Name: Sir Destry
Cards.SpecialText: Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.
Cards.FullText: Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.

Cards.Name: Sir Michael
Cards.SpecialText: Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.
Cards.FullText: Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.

Cards.Name: Sir Vander
Cards.SpecialText: Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.<hr>When you trash this, gain a Gold.
Cards.FullText: Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.<hr>When you trash this, gain a Gold.

Cards.Name: Altar
Cards.SpecialText: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing up to 5 Coins.
Cards.FullText: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing up to 5 Coins.

Cards.Name: Hunting Grounds
Cards.FullText: +4 Cards<hr>When you trash this, gain a Duchy or 3 Estates.
